name: The Crazy One
description: A Guy Gardner tumblr dash theme.
additional_info:
Thanks to ohnemitleid.tumblr.com for the code to make the fanmail, like/reblog, and follow buttons in individual blogs transparent again.

If you'd like to upload the images to your own account, all of the images are here: http://photobucket.com/gldash
Just search and replace the following:
Background: http://i44.tinypic.com/2uti5ar.jpg
Logo: http://29.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lyxz02JsMy1qa7g4ro1_250.png
Permalink hover image: http://28.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lyxyzow5Vr1qa7g4ro1_100.gif

If you'd like Green Lantern themed new post icons, I recommend style 46458 (mostly because I am using it and I love it).
